channel.title: My Game Site - GamersAtlas - Work In Progress
channel.description:
Well there was a whole bunch of explanation here earlier but I delete it. This is my project im working on. Basically since I don't have the resources to maintain my own site at the moment I will use data from GameSpot & IGN to fill my site and it will be a sort of portal for those two main sources of gaming information.
1/03/2011 www.gamersatlas.com
7/28/2011 - Incomplete but started www.gamersatlas.com/register/ www.gamersatlas.com/pc /xbox /psp etc.......
8/1/2011 - Incomplete but started http://gamersatlas.com/news/news.php?ns=gs http://gamersatlas.com/news/news.php?ns=ign

item.title: My Game Site - GamersAtlas - Work In Progress
item.dc:creator: @DEFET DEFET
item.description:
@DEFET wrote:

when hovering over the ‘Forum’ tab and the hover background doesnt reach the end makes me and my ocd gayer

my shitty opinions:
slidebar should be very slightly faster.
smaller and different font for the labels of the games on the ‘Top Rated Games’ column
popular games should have higher heights between each row of games
register page sort of seems to have that ‘unlegit’ feeling, can’t really explain it.
fuck that static background movement
arrows in each column header should be slightly smaller, or the text should be slightly larger.
borders on circles in slidebar are pissing me off (the anti-aliasing)
mouse-overing the selections in the ‘News Releases’ should not have the text cursor, but instead either the pointer cursor or default cursor.

else is looking pretty good

Read full topic
item.source: My Game Site - GamersAtlas - Work In Progress

item.title: My Game Site - GamersAtlas - Work In Progress
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

.Unlimited:

On the main page the ‘top rated games’ the last word or so is cut off and it doesn’t scroll.

Interesting. I think this depends alot about what browser you are using on chrome it looks perfect but I tested it on a school computer and my custom font didnt even load and it looked all screwed up. Besides the fact that I lost alot of interest in this project.

Anybody interested in helping out on this project?

I figured out how I am going to post reviews and shit. Basically just use vanilla forums for reviews and the main page will just display the links.
